results.name: Primes of the form 3^n - 2^n.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..12
program: (MAGMA) [a: n in [0..300] | IsPrime(a) where a is  3^n - 2^n]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 08 2011
(PARI) lista(nn) = for(k=1, nn, if(isprime(p=3^k-2^k), print1(p", "))) \\ _Altug Alkan_, Mar 04 2018
xref: Cf. A001047 (3^n-2^n) and A057468 (n such that 3^n-2^n is prime).
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 02 2001
